it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.sip
Class Address

java.lang.Object
  org.zoolu.sip.address.SipURL
      it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.sip.Address

public class Address
extends org.zoolu.sip.address.SipURL

Class Address is used to represent a valid address for peer in the form:
peername@pcdomain:port

It forms a SIP address.

Author:
Fabrizio Caramia
